main event: A light was observed in the sky over Colorado Springs, Colorado.
interesting points: The light was alternating between white and red colors.
The light moved slowly, changed color, and then blinked out.
The investigating officer believed the object was likely vehicle lights on Pikes Peak Toll Road.
The Peterson Tower confirmed the sighting appeared to be vehicle lights.
sighted object: a lighted white and red light
location: West side of Colorado Springs, Colorado
